## Ressources
- [netneurotools](https://netneurotools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html)
- [PySurfer](https://pysurfer.github.io/index.html)
- [NiLearn](https://nilearn.github.io/stable/index.html)
- [Enigma Toolbox](https://enigma-toolbox.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
- [HCP-utils](https://rmldj.github.io/hcp-utils/)
- [wbplot](https://github.com/jbburt/wbplot)
- [TVB Surface Visualizations](https://johngriffiths.github.io/LabNotebook/mpl-surface-viz.html)
- [Mayavi](https://docs.enthought.com/mayavi/mayavi/index.html)
- [DartBrains - Connectivity](https://dartbrains.org/content/Connectivity.html)
